snippet.title: Capcom Beat 'Em Up Bundle - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Captain Commando invites you to play Capcom Beat 'Em Up Bundle, available now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch - Steam at a later date! Features seven classic arcade games: Final Fight, Captain Commando, The King of Dragons, Warriors of Fate, Knights of the Round, Armored Warriors, and Battle Circuit! 

Official Website: http://www.capcombeub.com/us/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CapcomUSA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CapcomUSA_
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/CapcomUSA
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/CapcomUSA/

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
